original_text: and on the vine there were three branches. As soon as it budded, its blossoms shot forth, and the clusters ripened into grapes.
korean_text: 그 나무에 세 가지가 있고 싹이 나서 꽃이 피고 포도송이가 익었고

sentences.original_text: and on the vine there were three branches.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 포도나무에 세 개의 가지가 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: and the clusters ripened into grapes.
